component.name: fan-control
component.summary: Control your fans with different behaviors

description.p: You can add items with the buttons on the right of the app. To save a configuration, write a name in the "Configuration name" field, and click on the +. To modify the value of a fan, you must select it in a Control item (the left column), select a Behavior, and activate the swtich.

ul.li: Display sensors data on real time
Control fans based on custom behaviors
